‚ùì FAQs:
1. How is ProNoto different from other productivity tools?
ProNoto combines note-taking, floating notes, sticky notes, a teleprompter, and an AI assistant in a seamless experience.

2. Why do I need a teleprompter?
ProNoto's teleprompter ensures clear communication for podcasts, education, interview preparation, and more. No more fumbling during presentations!

3. What is a floating AI assistant?
A floating AI assistant available on any website. No need to switch tabs ‚Äî all answers are instantly in front of you.

4. How are ProNoto's screenshots different?
Take single-click screenshots without copy-pasting. Select, click, and your content is instantly saved.

5. What makes AI note-taking special?
ProNoto automatically creates notes from keywords, summarizes content, checks grammar, and extracts web data with ease.

6. What about sticky notes?
Enjoy colorful sticky notes you can pin to specific webpages or all websites ‚Äî always keep your important info visible.
